templates.stem: If f(x) = {a}x + {b} with domain [{p}, {q}], find the domain and range of f⁻¹(x).
templates.hint: Domain of inverse = range of f; range of inverse = domain of f.
f⁻¹(y) is the x-value where f(x) = y. Swap rows.

templates.stem: Describe the transformations that map y = sin(x) onto y = {a} sin({b}(x − {c})) + {d}.
templates.answer: {(a<0?'Reflection in x-axis, ':'')+(Math.abs(a)!==1?'Vertical stretch scale factor '+Math.abs(a)+', ':'')+'Horizontal stretch scale factor 1/'+b+', '+'Translation '+c+' units right'+(c<0?' (left)':'')+' and '+d+' units up'+(d<0?' (down)':'')}
templates.hint: Form a sin(b(x−c)) + d → amplitude |a|, period 2π/b, phase shift c, vertical shift d.

templates.stem: The graph of y = x³ is transformed to y = −{a}(x + {h})³ + {k}. List the transformations in order.
templates.answer: {`Reflection in x-axis, vertical stretch by ${a}, translation ${h>=0?h+' right':(-h)+' left'}, ${k>=0?k+' up':(-k)+' down'}`}
templates.hint: Work inside-out: first translation, then stretch, then reflection.

skills.name: Poly Quadratics Polydiv
skills.description: Practice problems for Poly Quadratics Polydiv.

templates.stem: For the quadratic {a}x² + {b}x + {c} = 0, state the number of distinct real roots using the discriminant (no need to solve).
templates.answer: {b*b-4*a*c > 0 ? 'Two distinct real roots' : b*b-4*a*c == 0 ? 'One repeated real root' : 'No real roots'}
templates.hint: Δ = b² − 4ac; >0 → 2 roots, =0 → 1 root, <0 → none.

templates.stem: Use synthetic division to divide {p}x³ + {q}x² + {r}x + {s} by (x − {t}). Give the quotient polynomial only.
templates.hint: Bring down leading coefficient, multiply by {t}, add next coefficient, repeat.

templates.stem: For the circle (x − {h})² + (y + {k})² = {r}², state centre and radius.
templates.hint: Standard form (x−h)² + (y−k)² = r² → centre (h,k).

templates.stem: For the parabola y = {a}(x − {h})² + {k}, state vertex, axis of symmetry, and whether it opens up or down.
templates.hint: Vertex form y = a(x−h)² + k → vertex (h,k); sign of a determines direction.

templates.stem: Convert z = {a} + {b}i to polar form r∠θ (give r exactly, θ in radians to 2 dp).
templates.hint: r = √(a²+b²), θ = atan2(b,a).

templates.stem: Convert {r}∠{theta}π to rectangular form a + bi (exact values).
templates.hint: x = r cos(θπ), y = r sin(θπ); use common exact values.

templates.stem: Find the sum of the first {n} terms of the geometric sequence with first term {a} and common ratio {r}.
An infinite geometric series has first term {a} and common ratio {r}. Does it converge? If yes, give the sum; if no, write 'diverges'.
templates.hint: Converges to a/(1−r) only when |r| < 1.

templates.stem: Given f(x) = √x and g(x) = {a}x + {b}, find (f ∘ g)(x) and state its domain.
templates.hint: Inside the square root must be ≥ 0 after substitution.

templates.stem: Given f(x) = {p}x² and g(x) = {q}x + {r}, find (g ∘ f)(x).
templates.hint: Substitute f(x) into g: g(f(x)) = q(f(x)) + r.

skills.name: Poly Long Division
skills.description: Practice problems for Poly Long Division.

templates.stem: Divide {a}x⁴ + {b}x³ + {c}x² + {d}x + {e} by (x + {k}) using long division. Give only the quotient.
templates.hint: Divide leading terms step by step; remainder not required.

templates.stem: Perform synthetic division on {p}x³ − {q}x² + {r}x − {s} divided by (x − {t}). State the quotient only.
templates.hint: Coefficients: {p}, −{q}, {r}, −{s}; root {t}.

skills.name: F Domain Range
skills.description: Practice problems for F Domain Range.

templates.stem: Find the domain of f(x) = \frac{{a}}{\sqrt{{b}x - {c}}}.
templates.hint: Denominator ≠ 0 and inside square root ≥ 0 → {b}x - {c} > 0.

templates.stem: Find the range of f(x) = {a}x² + {b}x + {c} on the domain [-2, 3].
templates.hint: Vertex at x = -b/(2a); evaluate at endpoints and vertex.

skills.name: F Transformations Family
skills.description: Practice problems for F Transformations Family.

templates.stem: The graph of y = \sqrt{x} is transformed to y = {a}\sqrt{-{x - {h}}} + {k}. Describe all transformations.
templates.answer: {`Reflection in y-axis, ${a<0?'reflection in x-axis, ':'''}vertical stretch by ${Math.abs(a)}, translation ${h>=0?h+' right':(-h)+' left'} and ${k>=0?k+' up':(-k)+' down'}`}
templates.hint: Work inside-out: -x → reflect y-axis, then scale, then shift.

templates.stem: Write the equation obtained by translating y = |x| {p} units left and {q} units down, then reflecting in the x-axis.
templates.hint: Translation first: |x + p| + (-q), then reflect → negative.

templates.stem: Find the values of k for which {a}x² + {b}x + k = 0 has exactly one real root.
templates.hint: Discriminant = 0 → k = b²/(4a).

templates.stem: The quadratic ax² + bx + c has discriminant 36. If a = {a} and b = {b}, find possible values of c.
templates.hint: b² − 4ac = 36 → c = (b² − 36)/(4a) or (b² + 36)/(4a) depending on sign convention.

skills.name: Poly Roots Theorems
skills.description: Practice problems for Poly Roots Theorems.

templates.stem: List all possible rational roots of {a}x³ + {b}x² + {c}x + {d} = 0 using the Rational Root Theorem.
templates.hint: ± factors of constant term / factors of leading coefficient.

templates.stem: A cubic polynomial with real coefficients has roots 2+i and 3. State the third root and the minimal polynomial with integer coefficients.
templates.hint: Complex roots come in conjugate pairs; Fundamental Theorem of Algebra.
Use elimination or substitution; show x = …, y = …
Eliminate variables step-by-step; consistent small integers.

templates.stem: Solve the inequality \frac{{a}x + {b}}{{c}x - {d}} > 0. Give solution in interval notation.
templates.hint: Critical points x = -b/a and x = d/c; test intervals.
Evaluate P at the three feasible vertices.

templates.stem: A bag contains {r} red and {b} blue balls. Two balls are drawn without replacement. Find P(first red and second blue).
templates.hint: Multiply conditional probabilities.

templates.stem: Events A and B are independent with P(A) = {p} and P(B) = {q}. Find P(A ∩ B').
Find \lim_{x \to {a}} \frac{x² - {a}²}{x - {a}}.
templates.hint: Factor numerator as difference of squares → (x + {a})(x − {a}).

templates.stem: At which value of x is f(x) = \frac{{a}x² + {b}x + {c}}{{d}x + {e}} discontinuous (removable or jump)? State type.
templates.hint: Discontinuity where denominator = 0; check if numerator also 0.

skills.name: Conics Ellipse Hyperbola
skills.description: Practice problems for Conics Ellipse Hyperbola.

templates.stem:
Identify the conic and state its centre:
\frac{(x-{h})^2}{{a$^2$}} + \frac{(y-{k})^2}{{b$^2$}} = 1 (a > b > 0).
templates.hint: When both terms are added and =1 → ellipse.

templates.stem:
Identify the conic and state its centre:
\frac{(x-{h})^2}{{p$^2$}} - \frac{(y-{k})^2}{{q$^2$}} = 1.
templates.hint: Subtraction and =1 → hyperbola; opens horizontally.

templates.stem: Express in polar form and compute (√3 + i)^5 using De Moivre’s theorem. Give exact rectangular form.
templates.hint: First write √3 + i = 2∠π/6.

templates.stem: Find the three cube roots of {r}∠{θ}π in rectangular form (exact).
templates.hint: Roots are r^{1/3} ∠ (θπ + 2kπ)/3 for k=0,1,2.

skills.name: Seq Arithmetic Sigma
skills.description: Practice problems for Seq Arithmetic Sigma.

templates.stem: An arithmetic sequence has first term {a} and common difference {d}. Find the sum of the first {n} terms.
templates.hint: S_n = n/2 [2a + (n−1)d] or n/2 (first + last).

templates.stem: Evaluate \sum_{k=1}^{n} (3k - 1).
templates.hint: Separate: 3\sum k − \sum 1.
Set equal → x² - {a}x + {b} - {c}x - {d} = 0.

templates.stem:
Solve x² + y² = {r²}
x + y = {s}
templates.hint: y = {s} - x → substitute into circle.

skills.name: Inequalities Quadratic Modulus
skills.description: Practice problems for Inequalities Quadratic Modulus.

templates.stem: Solve {a}x² + {b}x + {c} < 0. Give solution in interval notation.
templates.hint: Find roots first, then test parabola direction.

templates.stem: Solve |x - {h}| + |x + {k}| ≤ {m}.
templates.hint: Sum of distances to {h} and -{k} is constant; bounded by median points.

templates.stem: Calculate ^{n}C_{r} (or write in factorial form).
templates.hint: \binom{n}{r} = n!/(r!(n-r)!).

templates.stem: Expand (x + 2)^{5} using the binomial theorem.
templates.hint: General term \binom{5}{k} x^{5-k} 2^k.

templates.stem: X ~ Bin({n},{p}). Find P(X = {k}). Give exact answer.
templates.hint: Binomial formula.

templates.stem: X ~ N(μ = {μ}, σ² = {σ²}). Find P({a} < X < {b}) using standard normal table values (give to 3 dp).
templates.hint: Standardise to Z-scores first.

skills.name: Limits Infinity Ivt
skills.description: Practice problems for Limits Infinity Ivt.

templates.stem: Evaluate \lim_{x \to \infty} \frac{{a}x^3 + {b}x - {c}}{{d}x^3 - {e}x^2 + {f}}.
templates.hint: Divide numerator and denominator by highest power x³.

templates.stem: f(x) is continuous on [{p},{q}] with f({p}) = -{a} and f({q}) = {b} (a,b > 0). Using IVT, state a value of c where f(c) = 0.
templates.hint: Intermediate Value Theorem guarantees at least one root.
